title: Respect the masjid
copy: Please respect the masjid by turning off your phone and refraining from talking during the khutbah.

title: Join the Madni Masjid WhatsApp group
copy: Stay up to date with the latest news and events by joining the Madni Masjid WhatsApp group. Scan the QR code to join.

title: New build update
copy: The new build is progressing well. We are currently in the process of installing the roof. Please donate generously to help us complete the build.
